S.FORM: = Cote d'ivoirie = Gaga kska Meycow ka Cote d'ivoirie, 8 00 N, 5 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 322,463 sq km(hangan na o Tg69)(knlbanga dxgal o 318,003 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 4,460 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 23,740,424 hiyi. Gaga Yamoussoukro ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 7 idas 8 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Cote d'ivoirie ga wada sugan 64.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 32.70% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 2.50% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Alassane Dramane Ouattara, pnaah hngkawas2010 idas 12 jiyax 4pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Syangya Hayan konghokwo Kari snblayan Syangya Hayan, koka wa mniq iril Ahuyrika, narac u mslutuc Cyana, hunac u u msdalih Cineyyawan, iril u dhuq Raypijweyya mi Cineyya, tudaya u msdalih Mari mi Pucinahwaso. Mniq mtltu mccbu cida han ka Syangya Hayan pa, mblayaq bay sunca koka iril Ahuyrika, binaw babaw kngkawas 1985 da u alaw ka mqnaqah ka seyji mi ini knbaka knpruyux mi wada so ini tduwa ka ckcka koka mi iyax kngkawas 2002~2011 mnuda mccbu nanaq ka dhiya, maku wada mstabuy ka keyjay dha. Singcng cyuhwa Pusu tyawmu: Syangya Hayan sing cng cyuhwa Syangya Hayan sing cng cyuhwa ici ka tacyu , arci ka nniqan , sanci ka sng ,suci ka hukusng dhuq kngkawas 2013 mnhdu, kana balay pa niqan Tacyu 14, nniqan u 31, sng u 108, hukusng u 510. 1.Aneypi cyu 2.Pahun cyu 3.Syasasangtora cyu 4.Tngkayray cyu 5.Maxal mspac duwiyaq cyu 6.Huromakoar cyu 7.Sangsasangtora cyu 8.Langu cyu 9.Syeyhu cyu 10. Marawey cyu 11.Congkawari cyu Seyji Kndadax kngkawas 1983 prading, Syangya Hayan mndungus balay sotu pa kndadax Abidjan thdil dhuq Yamusoko, binaw balay bay pusu stmaun qpahun ana manu pa ida nanaq Abidjan na. Hbaraw balay tasukwan pa ida wa mniq Abidjan uri na. Tnpusu sediq koka Syangya Hayan u ida wisu snparu qmita wada dha hyaun qmita ka qnrapan dha uxay so mnccbu mi llaqi ka wisu ngalun quli mpqpah qpahun koko uri ka lmlamu uuda. Kndadax babaw ndanan kngkawas 2002 idas 9 diyax 19 (qmita"rikisi"), mnuda Syangya Hayan koming mccbu, tudaya u spudaheytay knspaux "Burah heytay(kari Hwaransi:Forces nouvelles)" dmudul qmlahang. Naka balay kngkawas 2005 idas 10 cida ka muda umaw burah soto. Kiya mi, alaw ini dhuq psramal da mi wada mscuqi, ini kdungus muda kaseyngkyo cida. Wada mnhdu muda ka kngkawas 2002 dhuq kngkawas 2011 ka qnlqilan seyji da u, spuda mawyi mi kari bay nngalan ka koko u wada ini biyaw so burah pngerah mkala quri keyjay Ahuyrika ka dhiya, binaw butay u pnspuwan heytay knspaux mccbu cuxan mi heytay seyhu, alaw ka wada bsiyaq balay ka mtdiyan, Butay u ini dhuq msbalay bay uri, qbhangan iyux mddha kddiyax sa ka dhiya nanaq. Kngkawas 2017 idas 1 prading alaw ini qqaras quri nngalan dha hbangan ka heytay, knspaux u kndadax tudha beyhing maci Bouake mi kndudul mrana dhuq sotu Abidjan, tturu beyhing alang ka niqan mspaux heytay, binaw plaxan Wada pusa kari ka butay u uxaybalay bay knspaux, pusu sngtangan dha pa meysa pkrana hbangan sntkuwan dha quri seyhu. Tiri Syangya Hayan u wa mniq iril kngahu ucilung Ahuyrika mquri tuhunac u Cineyyawan, mquri iril u Raypijweyya mi Cineyya, tudaya u msdalih Mari mi Pucinahwaso, tunarac u msdalih Cyana. Kana bay knlbangan u 322463 pinghwang kongri, knbbaraw kngahu ucilung u 550 kongri. Kana dxral kndadax iril tudaya mquri narac hunac mstabuy, pdkaun kana u ini sttu balay, tuiril daya u haypa 500~1000 meyta ka dwiyaq Mangtai Cyori lmiqu, tudaya haypa u 200~500 meyta ka ini kbaraw bbrnux, tunarac hunac haypa ini scuqi 50 meyta Hayan mi Cineyya ka dwiyaq Ningpa, haypa 1752 meyta. Pusu balay yayung u kndadax tuhunac mquri tudaya qluluy, niqan yayung Pangtama(950 kongri), yayung Komoay(900 kongri), yayung Tora(650 kongri), yayung Kawari(600 kongri), knbbaraw kana yayung pa 3100 kongri, kana balay knlbangan yayung u 232,700 pinghwang kongri. Kntlxan karaca hini. Peywey 7° tuhunac u kntlxan quyux karac kiya, Peywey 7° tudaya u kntlxan mspriq karac kiya. Idas 2~4 u mtilux balay, pdkaun kana ka kntlxan karac u 24～32℃; idas 8 ka mskuy balay, pdkaun kana ka knskuy karac u 22～28℃. Hnyuwan nniqan: Mndungus kari pa, kana hnyuwan koka u kndadax tuhunac mquri tudaya ka kndudul baraw, tuckcka u knbaraw dudux dwiyaq u niqan 914 meyta dhuq 1524 meyta ka dwiyaq, babaw daya brnux u pnpuwan bbnaqi tipiq btunux. Tiri cyu: Hnyuwan koka niyi u, kndadax tuhunac ngengahu ucilung hmqangaw kana koka dhuq ayus tudaya, malu tura balay psnakan langu qsiya stmuwan mi mklmiqu mi mksspriq tturu nniqan. Nniqan Langu qsiya stmuwan Nniqan langu qsiya stmuwan pa kndadax Huryeysuko dhuq ayus Cyana, knbbaraw na u 297 kongri; nniqan hini u kndadax kingal bbaraw bay btbnaqi psnakan na ka Ucilung Tasiyang, mkngengahu ucilung dhuq iyax Raypijweyya, ou bay ka knbaraw bay knngahu bbtasil. Langu qsiya sumuwan cyu u mkcutaw karac, kntlxan u sesu 24.4℃ dhuq 28.3℃(Hwasu 76℃ dhuq 83℃), knhuriq uri pa ya bay 77% dhuq 85%. Mniq kngkawas 140 diyax ka diyax mhuriq pa, qnnyuxan pa dhuq 3250 kongri. Nniqan Mklmiqu: Nniqan mklmiqu pa wa mniq bukuy Langu qsiya stmuwan, knbbaraw qqhuni u dhuq 24 meyta, mllutuc ka dudux qhuni mi, so wada kndxan bay mkmubung. Niqan duma ka mklmiqu qhuni u hmrinas 45 meyta, niqan ou ka qqhuni so uxiyux ka wa mniq iyax mklmiqu. Nniqan hini u yacutaw karac, ini so khuriq balay, ya bay 71%, knpriyux bay ka kntlxan, pdkanan u iyaxesu 13.9℃ dhuq 39.4℃(hwasu 57℃ dhuq 103℃), qnyuxan kngkawas u ya bay 990 kongri dhuq 2490 kongri. Nniqan mksspriq: Nniqan mksspriq u msdalih ayus tudaya, kiya ka mndungus bay kndkilan qqhuni mi sspriq beyhing bay brnux mksspriq. Nniqan hini u mkmtilux karac, psnakan tura bay kndnguwan bnkuwan karac mi knhriqan bnkuwan karac, kndadax tunarac daya Sahara bbuyu bnaqi miyuk kndnguwan mqbulic ka bwihur Yaarmata, kiya ka kndadax kngkawas idas 12 dhuq kawas idas 2 cida ka kndnguwan mskuy bnkuwan karac, kngkawas idas 3 dhuq idas 11 ka knhriqan mtirux bnkuwan karac. Karac: Syangya Hayan qmuyux bnkuwan karac u so tnnanaq balay, uka mbruwa qmuyux lmutuc mk10 diyax mi mk8 diyax, uka ini pstuq qmuyux tikuh uri, so mskingal diyax mi mkdha diyax mntxal mbeyhing qmuyux, qmuyux kingal mi dha jikang da u msuwan dungan, mtltu sbhuran. Pusu qsiya: Nniqan Syangya Hayan pa pusu bay yayung u niqan yayung Komo mi yayung Pangta mi yayung Sasangtora mi yayung Cyawara, kana yayung u ana so wana mkasu 60 kongri sngari, binaw quri so mkmhaqun qhuni u wada mdungus balay da. Keyjay Syangya Hayan mniq babaw kngkawas 1960 dukuricu da u, msupu Hwarasi malu bay pnluban niya na. Ou bay kluwanan smnalu nongcanpin ka cuko mi dmudul waycu mtmay cngce, kiya ka kndudul wada mrana mblayaq mniq kntlxan bay Ahuyrika koka ka Syangya Hayan, binaw, kawas kawas msturung kana mtqiri knlangan babawxral wada mhnuk kana nongcanpin ka Syangya Hayan, kiya kana ka pusu bay nongcanping koko mi kahwey mquri nganguc sbari u snturung beyhing bay pnspngan uri da; mumal krinah knrabang ka dhiya nanaq uri, wada so mqraqil ka kndusan mpqpah qnpahan mi qpahun mbbari da. Syangya Hayan u txtaxa koka pnsliyan Ahuyrika kongsangyey hwakwey pskngalun kingal uri. Knhbrawan sediq mi kari Knhbrawan sediq pa ya bay 2195 knbkiyan knhbrawan sediq(kngkawas 2012). Kana koka u niqan 69 klwanan minjoku, pusu bay u psnakan 4 minjoku beyhing pusu bnkuwan: Aken minjoku bnkuwan , Manti minjoku bnkuwan , Koru joku bnkuwan mi Woarto minjoku bnkuwan . kluwanan ka kari sduwi dha mniq koka hini, kiya mi Musurin u dmuwi kari Dyula ka qtanan dha mbbari uri. Kari bnkuwan seyhu Syangya Hayan u ngalan dha pkngalan kari (mniq Abidjan pa qulung bay so kiya) ka kari Hwaransi, sduwi dha balay mniq sapah pyasan uri. Syangya Hayan u wada mndungus bay mrana tuiril Ahuyrika koka ka dhiya. Saya Syangya Hayan pa ya bay 20% knhbrawan sediq u sediq qnpah muriq kndadax koka ssiyaw Raypijweyya mi Pucinahwaso mi Cineyya, ckcka u hbaraw balay ka Musurin, kiya mi wisu kndudul mrana, Syangya Hayan pa hbaraw bay sediq tnpusu u Roma Teynsukyo mi burah Kiristokyo ka snhiyam dha, ini khbaraw ka smluy mntna snhiya rudan cbiyaw. So kiya sediq qnpah muriq tnsediq koka Syangya Hayan mi sediq qnpah muriq musurin mniyah ssiyaw koka pa ini sangay ptraqil. Uxay wana so kiya, niqan 4% knhbrawan uri ka Syangya Hayan u uxay sediq qarux Ahuyrika, dhiya u twaw bay kndadax kongmin tuiril Oco, niqan uri ka pniyah kuriscyang tuiril Meyco mi Ripanun. Cyawtong Syangya Hayan cyawtong ppaun ckcka koka u mndungus balay, ppaun asu skaya ka mndungus balay, ckcka koka u niqan Abidjan mi Yamusoko mi Mancen mi Cyaniawa mi Tingpokoro mi Puwakay mspac pusu nanan trudu asu skaya, kingal dungan u niqan mpusal tiping sanan trudu asu skaya, niqan koci hangsyeyn ka kasi pwaluk Pari, tuhuy ssiyaw koka Ahuyrika mi Oco mi Meyco beyhing alang pa niqan asu skaya pwaluk mbrinah uri; mtbiyax balay ka ckcka koka asu skaya hangsyeyn uri. Quri so ppaun ucilung pa, pusu balay sanan trudu asu ckcka koka u niqan Abidjan mi Sasangtora mi Taputa mi Poropey sanan trudu asu, malu ppwaluk kana tubeyhing trudu asu mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral. Quri so cyawtong ppaun rulu, ppaun ruru ckcka koka pa mndungus balay, knbrawan kana elu u 80000 kongri, kiya mi 6500 kongri u elu snpawan hndanan krotang, miyah 20000 kongri ka uxay so mndungus elu, miyah150000 kongri niya uri ka elu naqah dan na, kana koka u niqan mturul sngari kluwanan ka rulu ppaun. Alaw ka twaw bay dwiyaq kobu ka ckcka koka, kiya mi muru so kiya mqriqu tubaraw mi tweruma ka elu uri, knttu msquri baraw mi mstabuy, mttuku balay ka mako pnhiyu ddha ssiyaw elu, malu balay ppaun rulu. Binaw muda elu btunux tiring tmuwan daw, msuwal u mqbulic, qmuyux daw msclaq balay. Ckcka koka u wana kingal bay murux elu kisya, kndadax sotu Abidjan mquri tudaya muda Poyako mquri Pucinahwaso. Knbrawan kana balay elu kisya niyi u 1282 kongri, kiya mi knbrawan mniq ckcka Syangya Hayan u 660 kongri. Binaw elu kisya huwu mi sepey u ini qndhuq kwoci sweycwen, tikuh balay ka ppaun kisya kddiyax. Tiyu Mntna balay kana koka Ahuyrika, mtur boru ka tukingal pskbiyax hiyi Syangya Hayan. cbiyaw Kndadax u pnsliyan mtur boru koka Syangya Hayan ka mbiyax balay mtur boru kana Ahuyrika, hbaraw balay mbtur boru pa dmayaw qmpah Oco ryeynsay, kiya mi niqan balay hangan phiyu kwoci Cyusing. Niqan bay hangan mbtur boru u wada taygo Tuawpa, kndadax Riaw Sarowenkaraw, Hopey Hwasya singhu cyuropu Syeyyunnu mi tnswayi Toni kndadax Mancng. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部

= Cote d'ivoirie = Gaga kska Meycow ka Cote d'ivoirie, 8 00 N, 5 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 322,463 sq km(hangan na o Tg69)(knlbanga dxgal o 318,003 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 4,460 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 23,740,424 hiyi. Gaga Yamoossookro ka poso alang paro, jiyax 7 idas 8 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Cote d'ivoirie ga wada sogan 64.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 32.70% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 2.50% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Alassane Dramane Ooattara, pnaah hngkawas2010 idas 12 jiyax 4pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Syangya Hayan konghokwo Kari snblayan Syangya Hayan, koka wa mniq iril Ahoyrika, narac o mslotoc Cyana, honac o o msdalih Cineyyawan, iril o dhoq Raypijweyya mi Cineyya, todaya o msdalih Mari mi Pocinahwaso. Mniq mtlto mccbo cida han ka Syangya Hayan pa, mblayaq bay sonca koka iril Ahoyrika, binaw babaw kngkawas 1985 da o alaw ka mqnaqah ka seyji mi ini knbaka knproyox mi wada so ini tdowa ka ckcka koka mi iyax kngkawas 2002~2011 mnoda mccbo nanaq ka dhiya, mako wada mstaboy ka keyjay dha. Singcng cyohwa Poso tyawmo: Syangya Hayan sing cng cyohwa Syangya Hayan sing cng cyohwa ici ka tacyo , arci ka nniqan , sanci ka sng ,soci ka hokosng dhoq kngkawas 2013 mnhdo, kana balay pa niqan Tacyo 14, nniqan o 31, sng o 108, hokosng o 510. 1.Aneypi cyo 2.Pahon cyo 3.Syasasangtora cyo 4.Tngkayray cyo 5.Maxal mspac dowiyaq cyo 6.Horomakoar cyo 7.Sangsasangtora cyo 8.Lango cyo 9.Syeyho cyo 10. Marawey cyo 11.Congkawari cyo Seyji Kndadax kngkawas 1983 prading, Syangya Hayan mndongos balay soto pa kndadax Abidjan thdil dhoq Yamosoko, binaw balay bay poso stmaon qpahon ana mano pa ida nanaq Abidjan na. Hbaraw balay tasokwan pa ida wa mniq Abidjan ori na. Tnposo sediq koka Syangya Hayan o ida wiso snparo qmita wada dha hyaon qmita ka qnrapan dha oxay so mnccbo mi llaqi ka wiso ngalon qoli mpqpah qpahon koko ori ka lmlamo ooda. Kndadax babaw ndanan kngkawas 2002 idas 9 diyax 19 (qmita"rikisi"), mnoda Syangya Hayan koming mccbo, todaya o spodaheytay knspaox "Borah heytay(kari Hwaransi:Forces noovelles)" dmodol qmlahang. Naka balay kngkawas 2005 idas 10 cida ka moda omaw borah soto. Kiya mi, alaw ini dhoq psramal da mi wada mscoqi, ini kdongos moda kaseyngkyo cida. Wada mnhdo moda ka kngkawas 2002 dhoq kngkawas 2011 ka qnlqilan seyji da o, spoda mawyi mi kari bay nngalan ka koko o wada ini biyaw so borah pngerah mkala qori keyjay Ahoyrika ka dhiya, binaw botay o pnspowan heytay knspaox mccbo coxan mi heytay seyho, alaw ka wada bsiyaq balay ka mtdiyan, Botay o ini dhoq msbalay bay ori, qbhangan iyox mddha kddiyax sa ka dhiya nanaq. Kngkawas 2017 idas 1 prading alaw ini qqaras qori nngalan dha hbangan ka heytay, knspaox o kndadax todha beyhing maci Booake mi kndodol mrana dhoq soto Abidjan, ttoro beyhing alang ka niqan mspaox heytay, binaw plaxan Wada posa kari ka botay o oxaybalay bay knspaox, poso sngtangan dha pa meysa pkrana hbangan sntkowan dha qori seyho. Tiri Syangya Hayan o wa mniq iril kngaho ocilong Ahoyrika mqori tohonac o Cineyyawan, mqori iril o Raypijweyya mi Cineyya, todaya o msdalih Mari mi Pocinahwaso, tonarac o msdalih Cyana. Kana bay knlbangan o 322463 pinghwang kongri, knbbaraw kngaho ocilong o 550 kongri. Kana dxral kndadax iril todaya mqori narac honac mstaboy, pdkaon kana o ini stto balay, toiril daya o haypa 500~1000 meyta ka dwiyaq Mangtai Cyori lmiqo, todaya haypa o 200~500 meyta ka ini kbaraw bbrnox, tonarac honac haypa ini scoqi 50 meyta Hayan mi Cineyya ka dwiyaq Ningpa, haypa 1752 meyta. Poso balay yayong o kndadax tohonac mqori todaya qloloy, niqan yayong Pangtama(950 kongri), yayong Komoay(900 kongri), yayong Tora(650 kongri), yayong Kawari(600 kongri), knbbaraw kana yayong pa 3100 kongri, kana balay knlbangan yayong o 232,700 pinghwang kongri. Kntlxan karaca hini. Peywey 7° tohonac o kntlxan qoyox karac kiya, Peywey 7° todaya o kntlxan mspriq karac kiya. Idas 2~4 o mtilox balay, pdkaon kana ka kntlxan karac o 24～32℃; idas 8 ka mskoy balay, pdkaon kana ka knskoy karac o 22～28℃. Hnyowan nniqan: Mndongos kari pa, kana hnyowan koka o kndadax tohonac mqori todaya ka kndodol baraw, tockcka o knbaraw dodox dwiyaq o niqan 914 meyta dhoq 1524 meyta ka dwiyaq, babaw daya brnox o pnpowan bbnaqi tipiq btonox. Tiri cyo: Hnyowan koka niyi o, kndadax tohonac ngengaho ocilong hmqangaw kana koka dhoq ayos todaya, malo tora balay psnakan lango qsiya stmowan mi mklmiqo mi mksspriq ttoro nniqan. Nniqan Lango qsiya stmowan Nniqan lango qsiya stmowan pa kndadax Horyeysoko dhoq ayos Cyana, knbbaraw na o 297 kongri; nniqan hini o kndadax kingal bbaraw bay btbnaqi psnakan na ka Ucilong Tasiyang, mkngengaho ocilong dhoq iyax Raypijweyya, oo bay ka knbaraw bay knngaho bbtasil. Lango qsiya somowan cyo o mkcotaw karac, kntlxan o seso 24.4℃ dhoq 28.3℃(Hwaso 76℃ dhoq 83℃), knhoriq ori pa ya bay 77% dhoq 85%. Mniq kngkawas 140 diyax ka diyax mhoriq pa, qnnyoxan pa dhoq 3250 kongri. Nniqan Mklmiqo: Nniqan mklmiqo pa wa mniq bokoy Lango qsiya stmowan, knbbaraw qqhoni o dhoq 24 meyta, mllotoc ka dodox qhoni mi, so wada kndxan bay mkmobong. Niqan doma ka mklmiqo qhoni o hmrinas 45 meyta, niqan oo ka qqhoni so oxiyox ka wa mniq iyax mklmiqo. Nniqan hini o yacotaw karac, ini so khoriq balay, ya bay 71%, knpriyox bay ka kntlxan, pdkanan o iyaxeso 13.9℃ dhoq 39.4℃(hwaso 57℃ dhoq 103℃), qnyoxan kngkawas o ya bay 990 kongri dhoq 2490 kongri. Nniqan mksspriq: Nniqan mksspriq o msdalih ayos todaya, kiya ka mndongos bay kndkilan qqhoni mi sspriq beyhing bay brnox mksspriq. Nniqan hini o mkmtilox karac, psnakan tora bay kndngowan bnkowan karac mi knhriqan bnkowan karac, kndadax tonarac daya Sahara bboyo bnaqi miyok kndngowan mqbolic ka bwihor Yaarmata, kiya ka kndadax kngkawas idas 12 dhoq kawas idas 2 cida ka kndngowan mskoy bnkowan karac, kngkawas idas 3 dhoq idas 11 ka knhriqan mtirox bnkowan karac. Karac: Syangya Hayan qmoyox bnkowan karac o so tnnanaq balay, oka mbrowa qmoyox lmotoc mk10 diyax mi mk8 diyax, oka ini pstoq qmoyox tikoh ori, so mskingal diyax mi mkdha diyax mntxal mbeyhing qmoyox, qmoyox kingal mi dha jikang da o msowan dongan, mtlto sbhoran. Poso qsiya: Nniqan Syangya Hayan pa poso bay yayong o niqan yayong Komo mi yayong Pangta mi yayong Sasangtora mi yayong Cyawara, kana yayong o ana so wana mkaso 60 kongri sngari, binaw qori so mkmhaqon qhoni o wada mdongos balay da. Keyjay Syangya Hayan mniq babaw kngkawas 1960 dokorico da o, msopo Hwarasi malo bay pnloban niya na. Oo bay klowanan smnalo nongcanpin ka coko mi dmodol wayco mtmay cngce, kiya ka kndodol wada mrana mblayaq mniq kntlxan bay Ahoyrika koka ka Syangya Hayan, binaw, kawas kawas mstorong kana mtqiri knlangan babawxral wada mhnok kana nongcanpin ka Syangya Hayan, kiya kana ka poso bay nongcanping koko mi kahwey mqori ngangoc sbari o sntorong beyhing bay pnspngan ori da; momal krinah knrabang ka dhiya nanaq ori, wada so mqraqil ka kndosan mpqpah qnpahan mi qpahon mbbari da. Syangya Hayan o txtaxa koka pnsliyan Ahoyrika kongsangyey hwakwey pskngalon kingal ori. Knhbrawan sediq mi kari Knhbrawan sediq pa ya bay 2195 knbkiyan knhbrawan sediq(kngkawas 2012). Kana koka o niqan 69 klwanan minjoko, poso bay o psnakan 4 minjoko beyhing poso bnkowan: Aken minjoko bnkowan , Manti minjoko bnkowan , Koro joko bnkowan mi Woarto minjoko bnkowan . klowanan ka kari sdowi dha mniq koka hini, kiya mi Mosorin o dmowi kari Dyola ka qtanan dha mbbari ori. Kari bnkowan seyho Syangya Hayan o ngalan dha pkngalan kari (mniq Abidjan pa qolong bay so kiya) ka kari Hwaransi, sdowi dha balay mniq sapah pyasan ori. Syangya Hayan o wada mndongos bay mrana toiril Ahoyrika koka ka dhiya. Saya Syangya Hayan pa ya bay 20% knhbrawan sediq o sediq qnpah moriq kndadax koka ssiyaw Raypijweyya mi Pocinahwaso mi Cineyya, ckcka o hbaraw balay ka Mosorin, kiya mi wiso kndodol mrana, Syangya Hayan pa hbaraw bay sediq tnposo o Roma Teynsokyo mi borah Kiristokyo ka snhiyam dha, ini khbaraw ka smloy mntna snhiya rodan cbiyaw. So kiya sediq qnpah moriq tnsediq koka Syangya Hayan mi sediq qnpah moriq mosorin mniyah ssiyaw koka pa ini sangay ptraqil. Uxay wana so kiya, niqan 4% knhbrawan ori ka Syangya Hayan o oxay sediq qarox Ahoyrika, dhiya o twaw bay kndadax kongmin toiril Oco, niqan ori ka pniyah koriscyang toiril Meyco mi Ripanon. Cyawtong Syangya Hayan cyawtong ppaon ckcka koka o mndongos balay, ppaon aso skaya ka mndongos balay, ckcka koka o niqan Abidjan mi Yamosoko mi Mancen mi Cyaniawa mi Tingpokoro mi Powakay mspac poso nanan trodo aso skaya, kingal dongan o niqan mposal tiping sanan trodo aso skaya, niqan koci hangsyeyn ka kasi pwalok Pari, tohoy ssiyaw koka Ahoyrika mi Oco mi Meyco beyhing alang pa niqan aso skaya pwalok mbrinah ori; mtbiyax balay ka ckcka koka aso skaya hangsyeyn ori. Qori so ppaon ocilong pa, poso balay sanan trodo aso ckcka koka o niqan Abidjan mi Sasangtora mi Tapota mi Poropey sanan trodo aso, malo ppwalok kana tobeyhing trodo aso mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral. Qori so cyawtong ppaon rolo, ppaon roro ckcka koka pa mndongos balay, knbrawan kana elo o 80000 kongri, kiya mi 6500 kongri o elo snpawan hndanan krotang, miyah 20000 kongri ka oxay so mndongos elo, miyah150000 kongri niya ori ka elo naqah dan na, kana koka o niqan mtorol sngari klowanan ka rolo ppaon. Alaw ka twaw bay dwiyaq kobo ka ckcka koka, kiya mi moro so kiya mqriqo tobaraw mi tweroma ka elo ori, kntto msqori baraw mi mstaboy, mttoko balay ka mako pnhiyo ddha ssiyaw elo, malo balay ppaon rolo. Binaw moda elo btonox tiring tmowan daw, msowal o mqbolic, qmoyox daw msclaq balay. Ckcka koka o wana kingal bay morox elo kisya, kndadax soto Abidjan mqori todaya moda Poyako mqori Pocinahwaso. Knbrawan kana balay elo kisya niyi o 1282 kongri, kiya mi knbrawan mniq ckcka Syangya Hayan o 660 kongri. Binaw elo kisya howo mi sepey o ini qndhoq kwoci sweycwen, tikoh balay ka ppaon kisya kddiyax. Tiyo Mntna balay kana koka Ahoyrika, mtor boro ka tokingal pskbiyax hiyi Syangya Hayan. cbiyaw Kndadax o pnsliyan mtor boro koka Syangya Hayan ka mbiyax balay mtor boro kana Ahoyrika, hbaraw balay mbtor boro pa dmayaw qmpah Oco ryeynsay, kiya mi niqan balay hangan phiyo kwoci Cyosing. Niqan bay hangan mbtor boro o wada taygo Toawpa, kndadax Riaw Sarowenkaraw, Hopey Hwasya singho cyoropo Syeyyonno mi tnswayi Toni kndadax Mancng. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部
